title: Fig and hazelnut cheesecake
ingredients: ['24 vanilla flavoured sandwich biscuits with filling', '4 tablespoons butter, softened', '225g dried figs, roughly chopped, divided', '175g roughly chopped toasted hazelnuts, divided', '675g cream cheese', '300g caster sugar', '1 1/2 tablespoons plain flour', '150g soured cream', '120ml buttermilk', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '1 teaspoon hazelnut liqueur', '4 eggs', '4 tablespoons honey', '2 tablespoons whisky']
